;-------------- #$c Faction Aggression ---------------

;;		700 is the max value

faction_agression	romans_brutii,		700	carthage
faction_agression	romans_julii,		700	carthage
faction_agression	romans_scipii,		700	carthage
;
faction_agression	romans_brutii,		700	epirus
faction_agression	romans_julii,		700	epirus
faction_agression	romans_scipii,		700	epirus
faction_agression	romans_senate,		700	epirus
;

faction_agression	epirus,		700	romans_scipii

faction_agression	carthage, 		700	romans_julii

;------------------- #$ Super Factions --------------------
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
; >>>> start of regions section <<<<

;;new superfaction definition
superfaction_setup romans_senate

;;defines who this superfaction will be hostile to by default
default_hostile slave
;;don't like the factions we're supposed to have our minions attack
default_hostile boii
default_hostile ligures
default_hostile carthage
default_hostile epirus
default_hostile taras
default_hostile messapians
default_hostile brutii

;;mission queues, allows you to give factions a specific track of missions
;;the mission must ALWAYS be preceeded by the reward or penalty for completing the mission and the amount of turns the player should be given to complete that mission

;;reward/penalty types:
;;outlaw
;;censor_investigates_family
;;censor_investigates_faction
;;quaestor_investigates_for_corruption
;;quaestor_investigates_for_financial_irregularities
;;quaestor_investigates_for_accounting_irregularities
;;senate_displeasure
;;secret_information_exposure
;;offices_witheld
;;major_exotic_unit
;;two_minor_exotic_units
;;two_best_buildable_units
;;one_best_buildable_unit
;;one_minor_exotic_unit
;;one_buildable_unit
;;major_reward
;;moderate_reward
;;minor_reward
;;promise_of_appointment
;;senate_gratitude
;;throw_games
;;one_triarii
;;two_triarii

;;mission types:
;; Help_Player
;; Demand_Suicide
;; Blockade_Port <settlement>
;; Assassinate <character name>
;; Exact_Tribute <faction name>
;; Subjugate <faction name>
;; Get_Map_Info <faction name>
;; Make_Trade_Agreement <faction name>
;; Declare_War <faction name>
;; Take_City <settlement>

;;julii first mission should be to capture segesta
mission_queue romans_julii
{
	promise_of_appointment 16 Take_City Volsinii
}
;;brutii first mission should be to capture Apollonia
mission_queue romans_brutii
{
	promise_of_appointment 10 Take_City Tarentum
}
;;scipii first mission should be to capture Syracuse
mission_queue romans_scipii
{
	promise_of_appointment 18 Take_City Messana
}

;------------------- #$ Campaign Script --------------------
script
campaign_script.txt
;4_turns_per_year_script.txt
;tutorial.txt, once_only
;>>>>>>>> end of campaign script <<<<<<<
